official_title: Resolution calling upon the President to report to the Congress on steps taken by the executive branch to avert a crisis in the trucking industry.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President report to the Congress on steps taken by the executive branch to avert a crisis in the trucking industry.

titles.title: Resolution calling upon the President to report to the Congress on steps taken by the executive branch to avert a crisis in the trucking industry.
